text: @SteveScalise Then cut the corporate bailout! Think about the American people 1st for once! You guys already politicized the COVID19, which is partly why we're in the situation we're in! It was a HOAX, remember?! Do not bail out cruise ships that don't pay American taxes-fuck them!
